trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK103_04553_SEQ_00<tab>Maru is gazing sadly at an empty crate.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK103_04553_TODO_00<tab>Survey the area from the designated location and defeat any manjusaka that appear.
TEXT_BANARK103_04553_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bundle of thick manjusaka vines to Maru.

TEXT_BANARK103_04553_MARU_000_001<tab>Listen, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─an important part of ridin' is bein' ready to ride at all times. And that means keepin' up regular maintenance on your cart.
TEXT_BANARK103_04553_MARU_000_002<tab>It so happens that we're runnin' low on certain spare parts, and gettin' more of 'em... Well, let's just say it's best suited for fightin' types, eh? Like you!
TEXT_BANARK103_04553_MARU_000_003<tab>If you could swing by the old Hamsa Hatchery an' fetch me some manjusaka vines, I'd be much obliged.
TEXT_BANARK103_04553_MARU_000_004<tab>You're gonna have to take down some small fry to get to the gnarlier chap, but his are the vines we want. A healthy handful should do!
TEXT_BANARK103_04553_MARU_000_021<tab>These are perfect! Our hippos appreciate your kindness. As do I.
TEXT_BANARK103_04553_MARU_000_022<tab>You see, these vines are what stand between the yoke and our precious hippos' skin─an' believe you me, you never wanna see a blistered hippo.

TEXT_BANARK103_04553_MARU_000_023<tab>We always make sure to keep fresh vines in reserve, but go through 'em quicker than you might think. I hope you won't mind fetchin' some again when the time comes...
